oai_dc:dc.dc:title: OCBB Raises Funds for AFA
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Christman, Chris
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Orange County Bird Breeders,based in Garden Grove, California,recently raised over 51 ,500 for theA FA . They did it by holding a specialraffle, the super prize being a young ,captive- raised, handfed Afri can greyparrot . The bird was obtained fromOCBB member/breeder Emma Allison.Felice Bahner took charge ofcaring for the bird and organizing ateam of over a doze.n club memberswho vol unteered to se ll raffle ticketseach Saturday from the end of june toSeptember 18th, the drawing date.OCBB, one of the large, active clubsof southern California, has organizedone of these special raffles annual lyfor the last severa l years. They havedonated from 5600 to 5 1,600 eachyear to AFA as the result of theirefforts. A hearty thanks goes to FeliceBahner and her dedicated team : joanEdwards , Donna Gerber, MarkSusa nka , Dave Baumgardner, KirkReynolds, jill Dugan, Brandy Bennett,Jackuie Popovich , John Dickson ,Bobbie Torre ll , Lorraine She! ton ,Henry and Peggy Kantrowigz.
